TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Bob_Allen, title = Bob_Allen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Allen} }

S.FORM: Bob Allen hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, p'agal tins' tay suruw, pzyang pkaki' tay kska'. kawas tay 1946, ryax sa tay 17 nqu tay 7, Bob Allen, squliq na p'unro. Bob Allen sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Bob Allen hiya ga magal blaq balay hopa pqwasan biru. kawas tay 1969,Bob Allen maki Minnesota Carleton pcbaq sato. kawas tay 1975,hiya ga mqwas biru maki Harvard hopa pqwasan biru. kawas tay 1973,Bob Allen t'aring praw sinisy maki Hamilton hopa pqwasan biru.kawas tay 1975,maki British Columbia rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzuy mari tara. kawas tay 2000,mtzyaw beh Oxford hopa pqwasan biru rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzuy mari tara. kawas tay 2002,maki Nuffield pqwasan biru rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzuy mari tara. kawas tay 2013,Bob Allen maki Oxford hopa pqwasan biru wal mhngaw ru ini pcizyaw la. kawas tay 1992-2003,Bob Allen mlokah balay mtzyaw magal wagiq ru blaq balay qbway. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players Bob Allen Robert J. Allen)

Bob Allen hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misow qaniy, p'agal tins' tay sorow, pzyang pkaki' tay kska'. kawas tay 1946, ryax sa tay 17 nqo tay 7, Bob Allen, sqoliq na p'onro. Bob Allen sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. qnxan nya(qyanox nya) Bob Allen hiya ga magal blaq balay hopa pqwasan biro. kawas tay 1969,Bob Allen maki Minnesota Carleton pcbaq sato. kawas tay 1975,hiya ga mqwas biro maki Harvard hopa pqwasan biro. kawas tay 1973,Bob Allen t'aring praw sinisy maki Hamilton hopa pqwasan biro.kawas tay 1975,maki British Colombia rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzoy mari tara. kawas tay 2000,mtzyaw beh Oxford hopa pqwasan biro rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzoy mari tara. kawas tay 2002,maki Noffield pqwasan biro rmaw pcbaq lelaqi mzoy mari tara. kawas tay 2013,Bob Allen maki Oxford hopa pqwasan biro wal mhngaw ro ini pcizyaw la. kawas tay 1992-2003,Bob Allen mlokah balay mtzyaw magal wagiq ro blaq balay qbway. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players Bob Allen Robert J. Allen)
